000: The exploration begins here, the west portal of the tunnel
001: Kilometer 11. It's cool inside the tunnel, it's nice to be away from the summer heat. The advantage of a short tunnel is that there is still some light inside.
002: And there we see the exit, so soon.
003: The east portal of the tunnel
004: While heading back a team member shouted "in", meaning a train approaching the west-side of the tunnel. I got into a sheltering-place and shot this picture. Proof there are driving trains through the tunnel.
